top_stories.title: RooflineBench: A Benchmarking Framework for On-Device LLMs via Roofline Analysis
top_stories.summary: arXiv:2602.11506v1 Announce Type: cross Abstract: The transition toward localized intelligence through Small Language Models (SLMs) has intensified the need for rigorous performance characterization on resource-constrained edge hardware. top_stories.technical_takeaway: Hybrid local-cloud inference is becoming the dominant deployment model.

top_stories.title: OpenAI Is Nuking Its 4o Model. China’s ChatGPT Fans Aren’t OK
top_stories.summary: As OpenAI removed access to GPT-4o in its app on Friday, people who have come to rely on the chatbot for companionship are mourning the loss all over the world.
top_stories.technical_takeaway: Adds empirical validation to approaches already used in production AI stacks.
top_stories.primary_risk: Unclear production readiness despite promising early results.
top_stories.primary_opportunity: Foundation for future optimization rather than immediate disruption.

top_stories.title: Zillow Has Gone Wild—for AI
top_stories.summary: As the housing market stalls, Zillow’s CEO sees AI as “an ingredient rather than a threat” that can both help the company protect its turf and reinvent how people search for homes.
top_stories.technical_takeaway: Adds empirical validation to approaches already used in production AI stacks.
top_stories.primary_risk: Marginal performance gains may not justify integration effort.
top_stories.primary_opportunity: Foundation for future optimization rather than immediate disruption.

top_stories.title: Discovering Differences in Strategic Behavior Between Humans and LLMs

top_stories.technical_takeaway: Reinforces known techniques with modest refinements to existing methods.
